Articles.Content:
Spoiler

 

-Xbox One Edition

-Default control preset

I noticed while trying to do the hall rt-5 'flea' solid fuel booster into flight above Kerbal, and escape the atmosphere! That the altitude was not registering when I was within the right range on the contract window therefore I can't finish any contracts requiering altitude... without using the debug menu.

Is there a fix incoming? Or should I just use the debug menu for now?

Edit: seems to be fixed now or I was imagining it not sure which. 

 

Edited February 12, 2018 by Seth Fox
